meanings.definition: A sound or series of sounds caused by the reflection of sound waves from a surface back to the listener.
meanings.sent1: The echos of the music bounced off the walls of the empty room.
meanings.sent2: The echos of her laughter filled the canyon.
meanings.sent3: The echos of the barking dog made it seem like there were many more dogs around.
meanings.sent4: The echos of the past haunted his dreams.
meanings.sent5: The echos of the thunder made the storm feel even more powerful.

meanings.definition: A close parallel or repetition of an idea, feeling, style, or event.
meanings.sent1: The echos of her words in the meeting were heard in the following discussions.
meanings.sent2: The echos of his actions were seen in the way his children behaved.
meanings.sent3: The echos of the joke kept coming back to him throughout the day.
meanings.sent4: The echos of the melody lingered in his mind long after the concert.
meanings.sent5: The echos of her advice guided him through tough decisions.
